name: Didier's journey
description:
From frenchgrammartour.com. 

Made with a power point presentation, it helps you review language learned with the website. 

Made in feb. 2021 by a team of 4 students under 60 hours (GameJam)

Here's a short video of the game being played:

https://web.microsoftstream.com/video/f79a9153-8ebc-4f4d-b4e6-48d40869659b
